Package com.vectorprint.configuration.decoration

classes that extend properties with features such as thread safety, readonly, observability, help support, parsing.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HiddenBy
    By implementing this interface you can indicate if functionality in your settings is hidden when wrapping it in some other settings implementation.
    Observable  
    Observer  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractPropertiesDecorator
    Base class for all decorators that add functionality to Settings.
    CachingProperties
    A Caching EnhancedMap, when the cache contains a value of a different type then the type requested the value is removed from cache and a VectorPrintRuntimeException is thrown.
    Changes
    Holder for notifications about property changes.
    FindableProperties
    This class provides static access to properties based on the id of a set of properties.
    HelpSupportedProperties  
    ObservableProperties
    Enables being notified about property changes
    ParsingProperties
    This decorator supports loading properties from streams, urls or files and saving to a url.
    PreparingProperties  
    ReadonlyProperties
    A Readonly EnhancedMap.
    ThreadSafeProperties
    A Threadsafe EnhancedMap restricting access to properties to a thread or child threads.

Package com.vectorprint.configuration.decoration Description

classes that extend properties with features such as thread safety, readonly, observability, help support, parsing. You can stack features for settings using subclasses of AbstractPropertiesDecorator, or, more easy by using the Settings annotation on a field for your settings. Beware that order is important, for example if you wrap ObservableProperties in ReadonlyProperties, notification will never be called.
